modName: Less Blinding Dragonborn Armor and Clothes Replacer
summary:
This mod replaces some of the vanilla Dragonborn Armor & Clothing (M & F) with a recolored version. Some Shields is replaced as well.

Now with Retex/Recolored Bonemold!
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE
Currently working to complete majority of Clothing and Armor and compress to just one download.

This is just my own personal preference from being blinded by these vanilla armors and clothing. The intention and release of this replacer/recolor is to be able to bear the Dragonborn armors and clothing until better retextures start popping up. For convenience the base vanilla textures used are from the HD pack released shortly after Dragonborn.

Also, you need to have the Dragonborn DLC installed.

Other than that installing is simple, you have 2 options;

1. Install with NMM (Recommended)
2. Extract to your Skyrim directory.

SIMPLE!

Uninstall info for file extraction is located in the respective README\'s in each .7z

If you\'re interested in what I did - here\'s the photoshop rundown for people who want to transfer the look to other armors or modify it. 

CHITIN LIGHT/HEAVY
1. Brightness/Contrast Layer - Contrast +50
2. Hue/Saturation Layer - Saturation -25, Lightness-5
3. Exposure Layer - Exposure -1.00, Offset -0.0025, Gamma + 1.00
4. Smart Sharpen the Texture - Amount 50%, Radius 3.0px, Remove Motion Blur, Angle 0, More Accurate.

Other notable mods used in screenshots;

UNP Dragonborn Armors by Exeter
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31392

Realistic Lighting Overhaul by sydney666
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450

Ethereal Elven Overhaul by nuska
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24273

DSpSob Dual Sheath plus Shields on Back by DarkPhoenixxy
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17746

Bandolier - Bags and Pouches by Dragten
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16438
author: Leyr
